_header: When Flora the queen of plesaunce
Title(s): The Isle of Ladies ; Chaucer’s Dream
Subjects: courtly love; May, songs of; envoys; dream poems; allegories
_description: The Isle of Ladies, or ‘Chaucer’s Dream’ — 2206 short lines with concluding stanza and Envoy (1529), and final couplet

BLAdd10303.First Lines:
When fflora the Quene of pleasauncehad whole atchiued the
                    obeisance…
BLAdd10303.Last Lines:
…& duer a thousand yere & tennein her good grace Amen
                    Amen
